name: Bike Frame
description: I realize that two years is not a long time. I realize that even ten years is not a long time. But when it seems insurmountable

name: Chain
description: Mechanism for changing the front gears by lifting the chain from one chain wheel to another; it allows the cyclist to adapt to road conditions.

name: Saddle
description: Set of metal links meshing with the sprockets on the chain wheel and gear wheel to transmit the pedaling motion to the rear wheel

name: Bicycle Handlebar
description: Tube connecting the pedal and crank mechanism to the rear-wheel hub.

name: Bicycle Fork
description: Horizontal part of the frame, connecting the head tube with the seat tube and stabilizing the frame.

name: Down tube
description: Part of the frame connecting the head tube to the pedal mechanism; it is the longest and thickest tube in the frame and gives it its rigidity.

name: Bicycle Gear Parts
description: The gear shifter is a hand lever attached to the handlebar. This allows you to shift gears via a cable that moves the derailleurs.

name: Bicycle Brakes
description: I realize that two years is not a long time. I realize that even ten years is not a long time. But when it seems insurmountable
